English: TYNWALD
ST JOHN’S 5th July, 1924.
ABSTRACTS
OF
ACTS FOR PROMULGATION
Printed by Authority by Brown & Sons, Limited, “Times” Buildings, Douglas.
Abstracts Of Acts for Promulgation on the 5th July, 1924.
1.— The Education Endowments Act, 1923.
Manx: Yn Slattys Ynsagh Nuy Cheead Yeig Tree as Feed.

English: The object of this Act is to allocate between thr Isle of Man Education Authority and the religious authorities certain endowments for education and religious purposes.
Manx: Ta’n aigney jeh’n Slattys shoh dy rheynn eddyr yn Oik Ynsagh Ellan Vannin as ny oikyn ny Hagglish giootyn er-lheh son oyryn ynsagh as craueeaght.

English: 6.— The Agricultural Weights Act, 1924.
Manx: Yn Slattys Towsyn Eirynys Nuy Cheead Yeig Kiare as Feed.

English: The object of this Act is to provide for uniformity in weights and measures used in the sale of corn and other crops.
Manx: Ta’n aigney jeh’n Slattys shoh dy yannoo unnaneys ayns towseyn as meihaghyn son creck arroo as troaryn elley.

English: 7.— The Juries Detention Act, 1924.
Manx: Yn Slattys Dooney Bingaghyn Nuy Cheead Yeig Tree as Feed.

Manx: Ta’n aigney jeh’n Slattys shoh dy lhiasaghey

English: 8.— The Pharmacy and Dangerous Drugs Amendment Act, 1924.
Manx: Yn Slattys Pharmakys as Stooghyn-Lheiys Dangeyragh Nuy Cheead Yeig Kiare as Feed.

English: The object of this Act is to amend the
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy lhiasaghey yn Slattys

English: 9.— The Workmen’s Compensation Act, 1924.
Manx: Yn Slattys Cooilleeney Obbreeyn Nuy Cheead Yeig Kiare as Feed.

English: The object of this Act is to amend the Workmen’s Compensation Act, 1919.
Manx: Ta’n aigney jeh’n Slattys shoh dy lhiasaghey yn Slattys Cooilleeney Obbreeyn nuy cheead yeig as nuy jeig.

English: 10.— The Bastardy Act Amendment Act, 1924.
Manx: Yn Slattys Oainjerys Lhiasaghey Nuy Cheead Yeig Kiare as Feed.

English: The object of this Act is to amend the law as to the affiliation and maintenance of bastard children.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy lhiasaghey yn leigh bentyn rish yn ayroilaght as cooid-coonee jeh paitchyn oainjeragh.

English: 10.— The Education (Rushen Schools)  Act, 1924.
Manx: Yn Slattys Ynsagh (Schoillyn Rushen) Nuy Cheead Yeig Kiare as Feed.

English: The object of this Act is to
Manx: Ta’n aigney jeh’n Slattys shoh dy

English: 12.— The Agricultural Rates Act, 1924.
Manx: Yn Slattys Keeshyn Eirynys Nuy Cheead Yeig Kiare as Feed.

English: The object of this Act is to amend the law with respect to the rating of agricultural land.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy lhiasaghey yn leigh bentyn rish keeshyn soit er thalloo eirinagh.

English: 13.— The Highway Act, 1923.
Manx: Yn Slattys Raaidyn Mooarey Nuy Cheead Yeig Tree as Feed.

English: The object of this Act is to
Manx: Ta’n aigney jeh’n Slattys shoh dy

English: 14.— The Local Government (Consolidation) Acquisition of land Act, 1923.
Manx: Yn Slattys Gurneilys Ynnydagh Unnaneysagh-Lhiasaghey (Keesh Ushtey) Nuy Cheead Yeig Kiare as Feed.

English: The object of this Act is to amend the Local Government Consolidation Act, 1916, as to the rates for water.
Manx: Ta’n aigney jeh’n Slattys shoh dy lhiasaghey yn Slattys Gurneilys Ynnydagh Unnaneysagh nuy cheead yeig as shey-jeig bentyn rish keeshyn ushtey.

English: 15.— The House of Keys Election Act, 1924.
Manx: Yn Slattys Reih yn Kiare as Feed Nuy Cheead Yeig Kiare as Feed.

English: The object of this Act is to consolidate the House of Keys Election Acts 1866 to 1920.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy chruinnaghey ny Slattysyn Reih yn Kiare as Feed Hoght cheead yeig tree feed as shey gys nuy cheead yeig as feed.

English: The Royal Assent to the preceeding Acts was given by his Majesty in Council on the dates set out hereunder :—
Manx: Va’n Choardail Reeoil currit gys ny Slattysyn shoh liorish E Ard Ooashley ayns Coonceil ec yn Plaase Buckingham er ny laghyn fo soit magh :—

English: To Act No. 1, at Buckingham Palace ... 11th  October, 1923.
Manx: Gys Slattys 1, ec y Quaiyl Buckingham ........... 11oo Xoo 1922.

English: To Act No 2, at Buckingham Palace ....  19th December, 1923.
Manx: Gys Slattys 2, ec y Quaiyl Buckingham  ........... 19oo XIIoo 1923.

English: To Acts Nos. 3 and 4, at Buckingham Palace ....  16th January, 1924.
Manx: Gys Slattysyn 3, as 4, ec y Quaiyl Buckingham  ........... 16oo I 1924.

English: To Acts No. 5 and 6, at Buckingham Palace ....  21st Marchth 1924.
Manx: Gys Slattysyn 5, as 6, ec y Quaiyl Buckingham  ........... 21oo IIIoo 1924.

English: To Act Nos. 7 and 8  at Buckingham Palace ....  30th May, 1924.
Manx: Gys Slattysyn 7, as 8, ec y Quaiyl Buckingham  ........... 30oo Voo 1924.

English: To Acts Nos. 9, 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, and 15, at Buckingham Palace  ....  25th June, 1924.
Manx: Gys Slattyyn 13, 14, 15, as 16, ec y Quaiyl Buckingham  ........... 25oo VIoo 1924.
